updates.content: Afrihost and Vumatel engineers are still working on fully restoring services for Vuma Villages in the Western Cape. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.
The emergency change is currently in progress and affected clients will experience no connectivity. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.
